root.name: Brian Lara International Cricket 2007
root.description: Brian Lara International Cricket 2007,(Ricky Ponting International Cricket 2007 in Australia, Yuvraj Singh International Cricket in India) was released on the 23rd March 2007, in line with the ICC Cricket World Cup 2007 in the West Indies. the game was released in the EU and Australian regions, as opposed to the North American market, due to the lack of popularity of the sport in that region.
